page.title: 13EPPERSTONE PEOPLE & HOUSES
page.content: The village has a{population }of less than 400 in 160 households.Most people rely on employment outside the village and many commute daily to Nottingham. Farming,the Police College,the larger houses & village services provide most local employment.A fifth of villagers are retired and only 50 are under 18. Most village{houses}are large detached properties in large gardens.Three grand houses in large grounds surround the church.Many of the older cottages & farmhouses have been modernised and extended but some small cottages remain.Post-war development includes a small close of council houses,some built for police use but now in private ownership,the four houses of Elm Park & up to 20 individual houses. One house is being built at present & five extended.All mains services are available except gas.
